Class Summary
AgentSettings Persistant Agent settings class.

Connect Connection Task This class us a Runnable class for connecting to the irc server.
IrcAgent Represent a player to an IRC server.
IRCTransport IRCTransport for Bukkit.
IRCTransportPlayerListener Handle events for all Player related events.
 

Package hef.IRCTransport Description

hef's IRC Transport. IRCTransport is a java plugin for the Bukkit Minecraft Server. The plugin acts as a bridge connecting Minecraft's in-game chat to a real world IRC server. The plugin creates an IrcAgent on behalf of each player, and joins a configured irc server/channel. Several IRC commands are supported: /me /join /leave /nick /names /topic additionally, players can use /channel to change channels.
